name: Push Technologies, S.L.
description: Developer of a cloud-based mobile marketing platform intended to be built to acquire, segment, and engage customers. The company's platform offers features like marketing automation, CRM, email marketing, push notifications, segmentation, customer profiling and related services, enabling brands, retailers, marketers and developers to optimize brand engagement and customer relationships.
one_liner: Developer of a cloud-based mobile marketing platform intended to be built to acquire, segment, and engage customers. The company's platform offers features like marketing automation, CRM, email marketing, push notifications, segmentation, customer profiling and related services, enabling brands, retailers, marketers and developers to optimize brand engagement and customer relationships.
